items.sentence: What color do you use when you paint the sun?
Tom came back last October for a brief visit.

Tom came here every Monday when he was a kid.
Tom said he wanted to buy something for Mary.
What kind of products does your company make?
People often buy things that they don't need.
Tom sold a necklace to Mary that he'd stolen.
I hope our friendship isn't affected by this.
